meanings.definition: Of or relating to an exarch
meanings.sent1: The exarchal robe was embroidered with intricate patterns.
meanings.sent2: The exarchal duties required great attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The exarchal hat was so large it kept falling over his eyes.
meanings.sent4: Her exarchal presence commanded respect from all who met her.
meanings.sent5: The exarchal authority was evident in every decision made.

meanings.definition: Having the authority of an exarch
meanings.sent1: The exarchal decree was final and not to be questioned.
meanings.sent2: He spoke with an exarchal tone that brooked no argument.
meanings.sent3: The exarchal cat ruled over the household with a velvet paw.
meanings.sent4: Her exarchal gaze seemed to pierce through any facade.
meanings.sent5: The exarchal power emanated from him like a tangible force.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the office of an exarch
meanings.sent1: The exarchal responsibilities kept him busy day and night.
meanings.sent2: The exarchal chambers were adorned with regal decorations.
meanings.sent3: The exarchal paperwork seemed to multiply on its own.
meanings.sent4: Her exarchal desk was always impeccably organized.
meanings.sent5: The exarchal emblem shone brightly on his official seal.
